name: babel-plugin-transform-diffhtml
description: Transforms tagged tempalates into createTree calls

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=umd browserify --im -x diffhtml -u diffhtml -s transform -g babelify src/index.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=umd watchify --im -s transform -g babelify src/index.js -o dist/index.js -v
scripts.test: npm run build-fixtures && mocha test/_setup test/assertions

author: Tim Branyen (@tbranyen)
